target_name: 개도국에 대한 공적개발원조와 자금 거래 장려
computation_definitions:
국제기구통계(2유형)
국제기구에서 추정 및 모델링 등을 통해 작성한 한국 데이터입니다.
UN SDGs 지표에 대응하는 국내 통계가 없는 경우에 국제기구통계를 통해 모니터링 중입니다.
indicator_name: 공여국과 수원국별 및 유형별 개발재원 총액(ODA, 해외직접투자 등)
indicator_definition: ODA와 기타 공적지원(OOF), 민간 지원 및 투자를 포함하는 개발재원 총액(개발도상국에 제공된 공적 및 민간의 유·무상 재원을 모두 포함)
computation_calculations: 경제개발협력기구(OECD)/개발원조위원회(DAC)가 공여국 보고기관(외교부 또는 재무부)으로부터 수집
un_custodian_agency: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
title: Untitled

en.target_name: Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
en.computation_definitions:
Estimated data by international organizations (Type2)
This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling.
If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
en.indicator_name: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
en.global_indicator_name: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
en.indicator_definition: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
en.computation_calculations: The OECD Development Assistance Committee (DAC) collects data from donor countries’ reporters (ministries of foreign affairs or finance)
en.un_custodian_agency: OECD(Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development)
en.global_metadata_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 202 KB)
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 202 KB)
en.graph_title: Total assistance for development, by donor countries (millions of current United States dollars)
en.source_organisation_1: OECD(Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development)
en.title: Untitled
